alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Becker; East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 05 at 6:24PM CDT until April 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Clay and Wilkin Counties. In North Dakota, Cass and Richland Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact travel. Drifting snow will cause difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Becker; East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
